text: {{Infobox writer |name=Natsuhiko Kyogoku|birth_date=|birth_place=Hokkaido, Japan|death_date=|death_place=|occupation=Writer|language=Japanese|period=1994–present|genre=Fiction, mystery, horror|notableworks=The Summer of the Ubume, Requiem from the Darkness|movement=|website=|spouse=|children=|awards=Mystery Writers of Japan Award (1996) Naoki Prize (2004)|Siblings=|signature=Natsuhiko Kyogoku signature.png}} is a Japanese mystery writer. He is a member of Ōsawa Office.大極宮 -大沢オフィス公式ホームページ He is a member of the Mystery Writers of Japan and the Honkaku Mystery Writers Club of Japan. == References == Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese writers Category:People from Hokkaido
title: Natsuhiko Kyogoku
